helper-roles.name: helper-roles

add.name: add
add.desc: Add up to 5 roles to the list of helper roles

remove.name: remove
remove.desc: Remove a role from the list of helper roles

clear.name: clear
clear.desc: Clear (reset) the list of helper roles

helper-roles.add-error: Error executing command: no new role is added
helper-roles.remove-result: {ROLE} is no longer a helper role
helper-roles.remove-error: Error executing command: no role is removed
helper-roles.clear-error: Error executing command: nothing to clear

<text>: Users with helper roles can use bot commands without any cooldown.
Users with helper roles can use bot commands without any cooldown.
